name: df-gcdOLD
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1
body: |- wceq(cgcdOLD(c0, c1), csup(crab(s0, cn, wa(wcel(co(c0, cdiv, cv(s0)), cn), wcel(co(c1, cdiv, cv(s0)), cn))), cn, clt))
comment: ` gcdOLD ( A , B ) ` is the largest positive integer that evenly divides both ` A ` and ` B ` . (Contributed by Jeff Hoffman, 17-Jun-2008.) (New usage is discouraged.)
